1.SceneDescription: The Hotel Lobby, Rachel and Phoebe are at the front desk checking out.

lines.Line:
Listen y’know what sir? For the last time, I don’t care what
the computer says, we did not take a bag of Mashuga nuts from the mini-bar and we did not
watch Dr. Do-Me-A-Little
Oh! Joey uh, were you in our room last night

No. (Phoebe grabs the receipt and shows it to Joey who gets mad.) I was
told the name of the movie would not appear on the bill

(to the front desk clerk) Hi! We’re checking out of the bridal
suite

(depressed) That’s right. I’m no longer a bride. I’ll
never be a bride again. Now, I’m just someone’s wife

And I’m the happiest guy in the world! (Monica goes and sits down
in a huff.) Oh honey, come on don’t be upset. We still have so much to look forward
to
They won’t be ready for weeks
They won’t be ready for weeks
Not the disposable cameras from the tables
That’s true! (Happily) I knew I married you for a reason

I’ll tell you what, I will go get them developed and you can go
home
What? What did you take a picture of
Okay Ross has the cameras, has he checked out yet

Are you joking? Check out is not ‘til noon and he has a good
(checks her watch) eleven minutes left
Ross has never checked out of a room a minute before he had to
Yeah, one time, when we were dating, uh we got a late checkout, he got so excited it was the best sex we ever had. Until y’know, he screamed out Radisson at the end

Okay, well I’m gonna get Ross, get the cameras, and get them
developed. (Joey laughs again.) 32 Joe. You’re 32! (Exits
(To Monica) Here’s a copy of your bill
(To Monica) Here’s a copy of your bill

Oh thanks. (Reading the bill) Champagne, strawberries…Oh my God! I
can’t believe Chandler ordered porn on our wedding night

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Phoebe is entering to see Monica sitting in front of a
mound of wedding gifts.

lines.Line: Are you gonna open the presents without Chandler

No! (Pause) But, they’re callin’ out to me! I mean this little
guy (Holds up a small one) even crawled up into my lap. Oh come on, Chandler wouldn’t
mind if I opened just one present! What do you think it is

A little mirror that when you look into it you see yourself as an old
woman
Ohhh! My God! For tiny salt
Ohhh! My God! For tiny salt
Oh wow! Okay. Well that was fun

Good. Okay, I’m just gonna wait for Chandler to open the rest of
them

Whew. Although y’know, this is part of a salt and pepper set. I
mean… I guess y’know it may just count as a half a present. What do you think

Well I guess it’s okay to open one more if it’s part of a set.
Y’know, it’s probably this one. (Grabs another small one.
Or this one! (She grabs and starts to open the biggest present.
Hey, how are you feelin’? Any morning sickness
Shh-shh-shh! The guys don’t know yet do they
Shh-shh-shh! The guys don’t know yet do they

No! Joey and Ross don’t know anything and Chandler still thinks
that Phoebe’s pregnant

Yeah that’s right Chandler does still think I’m pregnant. He
hasn’t asked me how I’m feeling or offered to carry my bags. Boy, I feel bad for
the woman who ends up with him. (Monica looks at her.) After you of course

Don’t worry I promise that you will only have to be pregnant for a
few more hours, ‘cause I’m going to tell the father today

Ooh, is it someone in this building? Is it that tall guy from the first
floor
Well then you have his baby
Well then you have his baby

Wow. Y’know it is so weird. I mean, you’re gonna tell this guy
today and he has no idea what’s gonna happen

Yeah. You’re just gonna knock on his door and change his life
forever. You’re like Ed McMahon except without the big check, or the raw sexual
magnetism
Yeah. Uh-huh, I guess it is pretty big news
Yeah. Uh-huh, I guess it is pretty big news

Pretty big? It’s huge! God, this guy doesn’t have a clue!
He’s just walking down the street thinking, ‘I had sex with Rachel Green. I
rock!’ then bam! He’s a father and everything’s different

Well it’s only different if he wants it to be. I mean, I’m not
gonna ask him for anything

Okay. Then he still has this huge decision to make. Now he’s
walking around thinking, ‘Do I want to be a dad?’ and then bam
I don’t. He got…he-he-he-he’s hit by a bus

Hey Joey, what would you do if someone that you slept with told you that
she was pregnant

(warily) Who called here? Did she sound blond? Huh? Did-did-did she have
an accent? I gotta make a call! (Starts to leave) I shoulda never walked into that
Sunglass Hut

Oh Joey! Joey! No, it’s not you! You didn’t get anybody
pregnant

Oh. Why would you scare me like that? What the hell is going on? (Pause.)
Is somebody pregnant
Oh my God Pheebs! You’re gonna have a baby

Yes. Yes I am. Oh my God, I’m gonna have a baby! (Joey and Phoebe
hug.
Whoa, wait a minute. Who’s the father
Whoa, wait a minute. Who’s the father

You don’t know him. It’s not important. He wants nothing to do
with me or the baby. (She sits down like she’s pregnant.

Well who is this guy?! Huh? Who is he? ‘Cause I will track him down
and kick his ass
David Lynn! David Lynn! David Lynn!! (Exits
Oh some guy from my gym. A little annoying

3.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Rachel is sitting on the couch as Phoebe enters.

lines.Line: Hey! Ooh, did you do it yet

Oh, well what are you doing here? Are you about to do it? (Gasps) Is it
Gunther
Thank God, ‘cause that hair on a baby

Phoebe the father is not here okay? I haven’t told him yet and I
don’t think I can tell him at all now

I don’t know, let me think. I was walking down the street thinking,
‘I’m gonna tell the father today’ and then bam

No, you! Phoebe you freaked me out. You kept saying how huge this all
is

I know, but I was just thinking about how huge this is for me. I
didn’t even go to how huge this was going to be for the father

You’re thinking about this way too much. Just tell him and get it
over with. It’s like, it’s like ripping off this Band-Aid. (On her arm) Quick
and painless, watch. (Rips it off.) Oh mother of…See

4.SceneDescription:
The Banquet Room, Ross and Chandler are in their tuxes and have started to fake
the pictures.

lines.Line: (to another couple) Uh, excuse me? Could you take a picture of us

Oh! Of course. (Ross and Chandler pose and she takes the
picture.
Uh, would you take one of us
Uhh… Yeah sure. (Holds the camera up to his face.) Click
Uhh… Yeah sure. (Holds the camera up to his face.) Click
I heard it. I heard it
I heard it. I heard it
Why won’t you take our picture

Oh yeah. I’ll take, I’ll take your picture. (He takes the
picture with his finger over the lens.
Uh, your finger was covering the lens
Uh, your finger was covering the lens
Who are you? Ansel Adams?! Get outta here

5.SceneDescription:
The Banquet Room, Ross is taking a picture of a plant, Chandler a fork. The
band stops.

lines.Line:
Why don’t you go up on stage. I’ll get a picture of you
doing the speech

lines.Character:
(He goes up on stage, mimes like he's giving the speech, and Chandler takes his
picture. However, before he gets down everyone starts clinking their glasses for a real
speech
lines.Line:
He goes up on stage, mimes like he's giving the speech, and Chandler takes his
picture. However, before he gets down everyone starts clinking their glasses for a real
speech.

Will the owner of a 1995 Buick LeSabre please see the front desk? Your car
is about to be towed
I’m sorry, I meant a blue LeSabre
I’m sorry, I meant a blue LeSabre
Well go! Go move it! (He runs off.
Okay, you ready for the last picture
Okay, you ready for the last picture

Get ready to run. (Chandler walks over to the new bride.)
Congratulations on your wedding. (He grabs her, kisses her, Ross takes the picture, and
they both run out.

6.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Obsessive Monica has finished opening all the presents.
She’s ashamed of this, at least, because as someone enters…

lines.Line:
(throwing up the last present) I don’t know how any of these got
opened?

I know! I know! I am a terrible person! I mean, Chandler is never going
to trust me with anything ever again
Oh hey! You got my parent’s gift! (Holds it up.
Oh hey! You got my parent’s gift! (Holds it up.
Well, I don’t know. I think it does something to salami
Tag is not the father! And Joey knows now
I do Rach. I do, and I so happy for you. (They hug.
I do Rach. I do, and I so happy for you. (They hug.
Oh wow, you didn’t even try to unhook my bra
So are you ever gonna tell whoever it is
No, I will. I’m just not up for it tonight
No, I will. I’m just not up for it tonight

Hey Rach listen, no matter what this guy says I want you to know
you’re not gonna be alone in this

Listen I uh… (He takes her hand.) It’s a scary world out there
especially if you’re a single mom. Y’know, I always felt like you and I have
this-this special bond. Y’know? So, (gets down on one knee again) Rachel Green will
you marry me
Pheebs, give me the ring back

No! Joey, oh you’re so sweet. You’re so-so sweet, honey. But
I’m not, I’m not looking for a husband
Now, if you will excuse me I am going to go and lie down. (Exits.

I can’t say that didn’t hurt. But I’ll take you back Joey
Tribbiani
Uh yeah. Pheebs, listen about that. I only offered
Uh yeah. Pheebs, listen about that. I only offered

lines.Character: (Chandler and Ross enter with the new pictures
lines.Line: Chandler and Ross enter with the new pictures.

Great! We’re hangin’ in the kitchen! (She drags him into the
kitchen and turns his back to the living room) Let’s stay in the kitchen
Now you are going to love these
Now you are going to love these

(showing her the pictures) Here’s a picture of Ross. (Shows
another one.) And that’s me. (Another one.) And that’s me and Ross.
(Another one.) Oh-ho, that is a picture of our first kiss as a married couple
Wow! That is a great picture
Wow! That is a great picture

Yeah! Oh and interesting because I found the cameras in one of our bags!
(Throws them into his chest.

Okay, so this isn’t a picture of our first, but it is a picture
of my first kiss with…with this lady. Which by the look on your face I’m sure
you’ll remember. So we don’t need—(Rips the picture)—There’s no
need to have this picture. How about I take the real pictures and get them developed right
now
That would be a good idea
That would be a good idea

Okay. (Sees the living room.) You opened all the presents without me?!
I thought we were supposed to do that together
Okay! (They high-five and he walks out.

Well, I’m gonna go get these (the floral bouquet he walked in with)
in some water
Wait you stole those from these people’s wedding
Wait you stole those from these people’s wedding

No-no, I took them from the hotel lobby. Yeah, they think they can charge
me for some dirty movie and a bag of Mashuga nuts, they got another think coming. (Starts
to leave.) Hey! My sweater! I’ve been looking for this for like a month

lines.Character: (He exits leaving a stunned Phoebe and Monica
lines.Line: He exits leaving a stunned Phoebe and Monica.

lines.Character: (He exits leaving a stunned Phoebe and Monica
lines.Line: He exits leaving a stunned Phoebe and Monica.
(slow on the uptake) Oh my God
